1.title: Dima Queue Management System
1.desc: DQMS is a queue management system for companies and enterprises. It was built with Laravel and Tailwindcss with an efficient backend and a modern looking UI.

2.title: Mr Diode
2.desc: An E-Commerce website, built with Wordpress and WooCommerce plugin. It offers smart filtereing technics, intuitive and responsive UI/UX.

3.title: MoviesDB
3.desc: A simple app that uses OMDb API to get data about movies and diplay them to the user.

4.title: Smart Green
4.desc: Smart farming monitoring sytem with data analytics, it's the software part of a whole IoT system built with Raspberry Pi and Arduino to monitor and predict the growth of plants.
